segments.text: Wait, is that water overflowing from the sink?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect to see the faucet still running like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's right there, but she hasn't turned around yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle spreading fast across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And look, the kids are raiding the cookie jar!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's balanced on that stool, reaching in so boldly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's helping by waiting with her hand up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She must think they're so clever, out of sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The plate in his hand, is he going to catch cookies?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window makes it all look so innocent outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, this is turning into quite the surprise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I never saw the stool looking that unsteady before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What will happen next in this unexpected scene?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view contrasts it all so sharply.
segments.speaker: PAR
